plot: A young mechanic loses an amateur fight at a carnival, and sets out to train hard to become a professional boxer.
title: The Fighting Gentleman
plot_es: A young mechanic loses an amateur fight at a carnival, and sets out to train hard to become a professional boxer.
plot_en: A young mechanic loses an amateur fight at a carnival, and sets out to train hard to become a professional boxer.

cast.role: Jack Duncan aka The Fighting Gentleman
cast.name: William Collier Jr.
